author: Luc Olinga
title: Your Bitcoin Might Soon Get You a Mortgage—No, Really
description: The new head of the U.S. housing regulator, a crypto investor with deep ties to Trump, wants to study using your digital coins for home loans. This is not a drill.
content: In a move that should send a chill down the spine of anyone who remembers 2008, the man now in charge of regulating a huge chunk of the U.S. housing market wants to see if your crypto holdingslike Bi… [+3817 chars]
